{{Wired embedded system |brand=Cloud Engines |model=Pogoplug |revision=E02 |upc=850877002061 |asin=B0044CL1N0 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=NAS |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_a=0.5 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0B-PCB0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G83EFR |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=4 |jtag=yes,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200,8,N,1),, 3.3V TTL,, CON3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Cloud Engines;, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22.18;KW LSP 4.2.7; |tp_firmware=Arch Linux (Arm), OpenWrt, |oui_eth=00:25:31 }} *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/cloudengines/pogoplug ''Pogoplug'' on the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :[http://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/pogoplug-v2-pinkgray Arch Linux Arm] alertnate firmware :[http://pogoplug.com/opensource GPL Source code]
See also [[List of Cloud Engines Devices]]..
